item.name: Adamantine Plate Armor
item.text: This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, one of the hardest substances in existence. While you're wearing it, any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.

item.name: Armor of Vulnerability (Bludgeoning)
item.text: While wearing this armor, you have resistance to bludgeoning damage.

Curse: This armor is cursed, a fact that is revealed only when an identify spell is cast on the armor or you attune to it. Attuning to the armor curses you until you are targeted by the remove curse spell or similar magic; removing the armor fails to end the curse. While cursed you have vulnerability to piercing and slashing damage.

item.name: Cast-Off Leather Armor
item.text: You can doff this armor as an action.
Source: Xanathar's Guide to Everything, p. 136

item.name: Adamantine Breastplate
item.text: This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, one of the hardest substances in existence. While you're wearing it, any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit.

item.name: Animated Shield
item.text: While holding this shield, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to animate. The shield leaps into the air and hovers in your space to protect you as if you were wielding it, leaving your hands free. The shield remains animated for 1 minute, until you use a bonus action to end this effect, or until you are incapacitated or die, at which point the shield falls to the ground or into your hand if you have one free.

item.name: Shield +2
item.text: While holding this shield, you have a +2 bonus to AC. This bonus is in addition to the shield's normal bonus to AC.
